sc-deploy.title: Bridge is under deployment!
sc-deploy.subtitle: A new smart contract is being deployed! We should be back soon.

unavailable.title: Bridge is under maintenance!
unavailable.subtitle: We are working hard to improve the Bridge! We should be back soon.

desktop.title: Massa bridge is only available on desktop

claim.no-claim: There are no active claims for address {address}
claim.popup-description: Claim tokens on {chain} to finalize your previous transfers.
claim.already-executed-message: Claim already executed, please wait for completion

top-banner.bridge-off: The Bridge process is temporarily down but you can still Redeem tokens. We expect to be back running soon!
top-banner.redeem-off: The Redeem process is temporarily down but you can still Bridge tokens. We expect to be back running soon!
top-banner.mainnet-coming-soon: Massa Bridge on Mainnet is coming soon!

tag.wrong-chain-bearby-tooltip: Switch to {network} in top-left corner of Bearby's extension

add-tokens.title: Add tokens to your testnet/buildnet wallets

categories.add-To-Massa: Add tokens to your Massa wallet

loading-box.subtitle: (it can take up to 5 minutes)
loading-box.rejected-by-user: You have rejected the transaction, please try again by clicking below.
loading-box.retrieving-claim-info-1: We are waiting for information to initiate claim.
loading-box.retrieving-claim-info-2: Please stand by or come back to sign later.
loading-box.already-claimed: You have already initiated a claim for this operation
loading-box.claim-message: One last step remains to finalize the redeem. To receive {token} on {network} you must sign a transaction.
loading-box.check: Go to your {name} wallet to check the token balance.
loading-box.add-tokens-message: You might need to add the token manually to see its balance.
loading-box.warning-description: Transfer delay due to high traffic.
loading-box.warning-contact: If not received, contact us at:
loading-box.error-drop: Please, drop us a message at:

error.general: Something went wrong! Please, try again!

error.wrong-allowance: Allowance is too low. Try again.
Allowance is too low. Try again.

error.general: Something went wrong! Please, try again!

index.warning-no-eth: To claim tokens, you need to have {fees} {symbol} to pay for transaction fees.

balance.error: We couldn't fetch your balance! Please, try again!

fee-estimate.tooltip-massa: Massa blockchain charges {fees} MAS to pay for the storage on the ledger.

connect-wallet.title: Connect wallets
connect-wallet.description: Connect wallets for {network1} and {network2}, to bridge tokens.

card-destination.non-massa-wallet: Switch accounts directly within your wallet.
card-destination.bearby-not-installed: Bearby extension is either turned off or not installed. Make sure the extension is on and refresh the page.
card-destination.massa-station-not-detected: Massa Station desktop app is not detected. Make sure the app is opened, or click below to install it.
card-destination.massa-wallet-not-detected: Massa Wallet is not detected. Make sure the plugin is installed, or click below to install it.
card-destination.massa-wallet-no-account: No wallet accounts found in Massa Wallet.

connect-metamask.invalid-network: Current network is not supported. Please, switch to {network}.
connect-metamask.no-metamask: It seems like you don't have Metamask installed.

errors.general: Something went wrong! Please, try again!
